onboarding-details:
We need to set and confirm the city where you want to do the inventory.
You are one step closer to getting your GPC emissions inventory!
setup-city-details: Search and select the city or municipality you'll work with.
setup-inventory-details-description: Provide some basic details about the inventory you want to create. You can edit these settings afterwards.
inventory-goal-description: Want to learn more about these inventory formats? <2>Learn more</2> about the GPC Framework.
gwp-description: If this is your first inventory, we recommend using AR6 (latest version) for your inventory calculations. If your city has previous inventories, use the same version as before. <2>Learn more</2> about GWP.
setup-population-data-description: Provide the population data for your country, region, and city. For accurate results, use values from the year closest to your inventory year. We use open data sources to pre-fill the information below.
gpc-basic-message: Only GPC Basic Inventories are supported momentarily. For population values the closest year to the city inventory is recommended, as it will be used for calculations and included in your GPC report.
confirm-description: Review the data you've entered so far. Please review all details carefully before proceeding.
confirm-details:
Review and confirm this information about your city. If there is an error please send us an email to edit it.

We use <2>open data sources to pre-fill the city profile.
done-heading: Your GHG emission inventory is ready to start!
done-description: Great job! You can review, add and update your inventory data anytime. Start completing your GHG emissions inventory now!
done-details: You created your city profile to start your GPC Basic GHG inventory.
information-required: This information is required and affects your GHG inventory accuracy.
population-required: Please enter value & year for population
inventory-creation-description: In this step, configure your city's GHG emissions inventory by selecting the inventory year, setting the target, and adding contextual data such as population.
city-boundary-info: In case the geographical boundary is not the right one <0><1>Contact Us</1></0>
unselected-city-boundary-heading: Search and select the city to be shown on the map
unselected-city-boundary-description: You will be able to check the geographical boundary for your inventory
welcome-title: Let's start with information about your city
welcome-description: In this step, choose a city to include in your project and provide relevant details that wil be used later.
city-population-required: City population and year are required
region-population-required: Region population and year are required
country-population-required: Country population and year are required
city-name-locode-required: City name and location code are required
upload-inventory-file-description: Upload your existing GHG inventory file. We support CSV and XLSX formats.
click-to-upload: Click to upload or drag and drop
validation-results-description: A key-value format with {{count}} fields has been detected. Review the interpretations below.
map-rows-description: Review and adjust the mapping of your data to the inventory fields.
review-confirm-description: Review the import summary before finalizing.
data-loss-warning-message: You have unsaved changes. If you leave this page, your progress will be lost. Are you sure you want to continue?
